questions.question: What is Trayka?
questions.answer: Trayka is an AI platform that combines Zero-Touch Automation and AI Knowledge Access. It helps organisations automate workflows, surface verified answers, and scale operations efficiently without increasing overheads.

questions.question: What is Zero-Touch Automation (ZTA)?
questions.answer: Zero-Touch Automation automates complex, multi-step workflows—such as approvals, routing, escalations, and audits—providing full governance, logs, and compliance with no manual intervention.

questions.question: What is AI Knowledge Access?
questions.answer: AI Knowledge Access uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to deliver answers sourced only from your organisation's verified documents, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and always-up-to-date information.

questions.question: Can ZTA and RAG work independently?
questions.answer: Yes. ZTA can automate workflows even without knowledge access, and RAG can deliver verified answers without any automation. Together, they offer the most value, but each can be deployed as a standalone capability depending on your needs.

questions.question: How do ZTA and RAG work together?
questions.answer: ZTA handles automated operational actions, while RAG provides verified context and answers during decision points. Combined, they enable both autonomous workflows and accurate information delivery.

questions.question: Is Trayka secure?
questions.answer: Yes. Trayka enforces strict access control, encryption, audit logs, and governance. All automation and AI responses operate only on your approved content sources.

questions.question: Where is my data stored?
questions.answer: Your data is stored securely within your chosen cloud region, following strict organisational access policies. If you choose, your data can also be hosted on-premises on your servers. Trayka does not use or share your data for model training.

questions.question: Does Trayka keep or log user conversations?
questions.answer: Trayka maintains auditable logs only if your organisation requires them. Conversation data is not used for external training and remains under your ownership and control.

questions.question: How does Trayka ensure compliance with organisational policies?
questions.answer: All workflows and knowledge responses are restricted to verified sources. Governance rules, role-based access, traceability, and auditability ensure adherence to internal and external compliance standards.

questions.question: Can Trayka integrate with our existing tools?
questions.answer: Yes. Trayka integrates with WhatsApp and other chats, email systems, CRMs, internal portals, HRMS platforms, data stores, and custom APIs to fit seamlessly into your organisation's workflows.
